file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-51-03-04 - PTT MIC SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PTT MIC SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the PTT Mic switches. B. The PTT Mic switches are installed on the left and right sides of the glareshield panel. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 23-51-03-000-801-A PTT MIC SWITCH - REMOVAL ALL 23-51-03-400-801-A PTT MIC SWITCH - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-51-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PTT MIC SWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the PTT Mic switches. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223AZ Glareshield panel C. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Soldering Iron To remove the solder and release the wires available D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the left and right sides of the glare- 1 Does the task shield panel H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them. • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • IINTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the three screws (1) and washers (2). (2) Remove the acrylic panel (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Release the four dzus fasteners (6). (4) Carefully pull the panel (7). (5) Unsolder the wire. (6) Remove the nut (4) and washer (5). (7) Remove the PTT Mic switch (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

A DET. B C C WIRE NUT PTT MIC SWITCH EM145AMM231453A.DGN DET. C EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PTT MIC SWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the PTT Mic switches. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500 AUDIO SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST WM 23-30-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223AZ Glareshield panel D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Soldering Iron To solder the wires available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the left and right sides of the glare- 1 Does the task shield panel I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the PTT Mic switch (8). (2) Install the washer (5) and nut (4). (3) Solder the wire, refer to (WM 23-30-00). (4) Carefully install the panel (7). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Attach the four dzus fasteners (6). (6) Install the acrylic panel (3). (7) Install the three washers (2) and screws (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • IINTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). (2) Do the audio system operational test ( AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
